resources.string:
" Pegasus Ride is a vehicle management app.

" "Why rent a car when you can lend someone else's car that's been sitting still for months. Maybe one of your friend's has one. Or maybe more. Lets check them all out. Its time to go for a long-ride.

" "Our app will help you to find a car that is cheaper than the car you were about to rent from a rent-a-car company. You can post your wheels too. Get on with this app. It's awesome.

"
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

" Pegasus Ride is a vehicle management app.

" "Why rent a car when you can lend someone else's car that's been sitting still for months. Maybe one of your friend's has one. Or maybe more. Lets check them all out. Its time to go for a long-ride.

" "Our app let's you help to find a car that is cheaper than the car you were gonna rent from a rent-a-car company. You can post your wheels too. Get on with this app. It's awesome.



"
"Developers: 

" "ABDUR RAZZAK RANA

I want it to be rented
Add your vehicle to your account
